content:
Now, whenever I see flowers,
They remind me of the tea Mobai brewed.

I guess that's what companions are:
People you happen to meet, who happen to click with you just right.

I wonder if it's because the tea was so delicious,
Or if the tea party itself was just that unforgettable~

The chrysanthemums here are blooming so beautifully,
As if they're bursting with a whole year's worth of anticipation~
And the tea we brewed tastes wonderful too.

Every time I think about our previous tea party,
I still get so excited!
